title: Pixel 3 requires a restart to charge - help!
content:
My Pixel 3 will not charge unless I restart it with a cable plugged in.  Meaning, I won't get a charge if I plug in while phone is on, but if I plug in and then restart my phone, it will charge.  

Things I've tried:
Different cables, different outlets - same results on my car, work and home chargers.  
Cleaning the port, brought to a cell repair place, they said charging port is fine
Safe Mode - no difference
Complete factory reset - still requires a restart to charge

Not sure what else to do, I'm out of warranty. Seems like it started after most recent android update, but it could be a coincidence. 

Anyone have any theories?
